title: Dumbbell 8 (247)
introduction:
Dumbell training offers resistance training for our muscles. Targeted exercises with dumbells can strengthen different parts of the body.
The aims of dumbell training range from strength training to increase muscle, to increasing ones general fitness by supporting weight loss. Furthermore, dumbell training is used preventively for rehabilitation purposes and health improvements.

Proper technique is important to prevent damage due to incorrect loading.

This video shows you how to use dumbells to strengthen your shoulder girdle from a standing position.
instruction:
Starting position:
Stand upright. Place both feet hip width apart on the floor. Your arms should hang down relaxed alongside your body. Hold a dumbbell in each hand. The palms of your hands should face your thighs. 

Step 1:
Bending your elbows slightly, lift your arms out sideways up to shoulder level and lower them again.

Caution: Keep your upper body erect throughout the exercise.

Repeat the exercise as indicated.
note: Strengthening the shoulder muscles with dumbbells, standing position
